events.message: I just received my order, but unfortunately the product arrived with a large scratch on the screen and it seems faulty. I’m very disappointed.
The issue has been categorized as Product Defect based on the reported scratch and faulty condition of the item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle this product defect complaint and will respond shortly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the damaged product. I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and any other damage so we can assess the situation properly?
I have attached several photos showing the scratch on the screen and the faulty buttons. This really affects the usability of the product.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement or a full refund for the defective product. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I’d like to receive a replacement product, please. Hopefully, the next one will arrive in perfect condition.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
We wanted to check in and make sure your replacement product arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
